SELECT si.*,so.plantCode,so.dateType FROM SYS_ORIGINAL_IMPORT si INNER JOIN SYS_ORIGINAL so ON si.originalCode=so.originalCode WHERE importType=#{importType} AND so.plantCode=#{plantCode} order by si.id
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ORIGINAL_IMPORT ( originalCode , sheet , row , col , importType )values ( #{originalCode} , #{sheet} , #{row} , #{col} , #{importType} )
mapper.select: SELECT si.originalCode,sod.originalValue,sod.id,sod.originalDataVersion FROM SYS_ORIGINAL_IMPORT si INNER JOIN SYS_ORIGINAL so ON si.originalCode=so.originalCode AND so.plantCode=#{plantCode} INNER JOIN SYS_ORIGINAL_DATA sod ON si.originalCode=sod.originalCode WHERE si.importType = #{importType} AND sod.dateType=#{dateType} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,sod.storeDate,120) LIKE '${storeDate}%'
